roadmap.title: 📹 The Content 📹
roadmap.content: Document the entire process on Tiktok of creating an NFT project. Use your Drippy Duck NFT to access docuemnted resources on how to build your own NFT project.

roadmap.title: 🐤 The 3D Model Collection 🐤
roadmap.content: Design cartoonish 3D modelled ducks (as determined by the TikTok community) and release initial version 1.0 collection.

roadmap.title: 🕹️ The Gamification 🕹️
roadmap.content: Create and launch a multiplayer game with Drippy Ducks integration. Provide documentation on how to design and build a NFT game. Allow Drippy Ducks NFT holders initial testing of the game. Release game free to play for NFT holders.

roadmap.title: 🌐 The Metaverse 🌐
roadmap.content: What's next is what I can BUILD IN PUBLIC for you on TikTok! How do we build a Duck Metaverse that is fun to play with your ideas! What do you want to learn? AR/VR? Metaverse Land? Metations? Open to Suggestions!
